name: VR Lab Rat #133
description:
This a short VR demo with optical illusions. It was made to demonstrate the findings of my Bachelor's Thesis on Implementation of Perception Psychology into VR design. The demo is designed for HTC VIVE headsets

"VR Lab Rat #133" is a series of puzzles where player needs to find a glass sphere to teleport to the next place. Each place is based on well-known optical illusion. This is a demo so interactions are simple.
